column4: question i have a website running on one of my boxes i want to ssh into it and do a backup of it and store that backup on this box how would i go about doiong that please if anyone would like to help that would be great
Write a small script that makes a tar.gz of the dir(s) you want backed up and automatically scp's the tar.gz to your machine.  Add it to a crontab entry for a truly automated backup solution!
I'd say read up on how to use scp, then open a few bash scripts and poke around.  Before long, you'll be scripting your way to bliss!
